Seasons_End.help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and unleash a quick succession of strikes at your target. While the attacks are so fast that the target is unable to catch fire, they suffer a tremendous burst of damage and have a chance to be knockdown with the final blows.
Seasons_End.targetHelp: You are caught in the Season's End, suffering fire and cold damage from a frenzy of blows.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Winters_Hearth.help: You immobilize your target in a field of ice which focuses energy in such a way that it also sets them on fire. While immobilized, the target cannot be knocked back, but when freed they suffer from reduced movement and attack speed.
Winters_Hearth.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold, Minor DoT(Fire), Immobilize (Foe), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -Fly(Foe)
Winters_Hearth.targetHelp: You are frozen in place and on fire. After you are freed, you will suffer reduced movement and attack speeds.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Seasonal_Shift.help: You rapidly draw in an immense amount of energy from the outer reaches of a 30' radius around you, igniting it in a fiery burst. The region within 15' of you burns, causing fire damage and reduction in chance to hit on enemy targets, while the region between 15' and 30' of you freezes, causing cold damage and reducing enemy targets' movement and attack speeds.
Seasonal_Shift.shortHelp: PBAoE, Moderate DoT (Fire or Cold), Special
Seasonal_Shift.targetHelp: You are affected by a seasonal shift around a Diviner. Depending on your distance from the Diviner when this attack is used, you will suffer either fire damage over time and a reduction in your chance to hit or cold damage and reduced movement and attack speeds.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Harvest_Blades.help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and slash your target. The fire blade deals fire damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Harvest_Blades.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Fire/Cold), Minor DoT(Fire), -Speed(Foe, All), -Recharge(Foe)
Harvest_Blades.targetHelp: You are on fire. Additionally, your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Autumnal_Equinox.help: Calling on the strength of the seasons, you concentrate both ice and fire on your target. The target is held in a block of ice and is unable to move while they cook inside the block.
Autumnal_Equinox.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG(Cold), Minor DoT (Fire), Hold(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All), -Rech(Foe)
Autumnal_Equinox.targetHelp: You are frozen in place and being cooked within the ice. Once free, your attack and movement speeds will be reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Antipodal_Strike.help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame, striking your target with both in quick succession. The fire blade deals fire and lethal damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold and lethal damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
Antipodal_Strike.targetHelp: You are scorched and chilled. You are burning even as your attack and movement speeds are reduced.
